Option.Title: What the hell are you talking about?

DialogText: No, it is not controllable by any stretch of the imagination! Only psykers can truly wield the Dust, and even then one must possess outstanding psychic abilities to realize the scope of its power. It wasn't until recently...near the time of your arrival...that the Dust began to exhibit even a tenth of its current potential. If you think for even a second that the High Lords, the Ad-mech or any other Imperial institution would allow psykers to be further empowered...[Burke looks at you inquisitvely]...Wait, you don't know, do you? You still don't know. You don't know why they sent you here, do you? [Burke bursts into hysterical laughter]
